info.description:
This interactive takes place in a world of futanari women. Specifically, it follows one girl, Cindy, and a strange power she gains. Some rules for the interactive:

All characters mentioned and used must be over the age of 18, as the interactive is directly sexual in nature.

All characters must be futanari women

Characters shouldn't die, and can simply be written out when necessary, even if temporarily

While certain fetishes may involve violence (ballbusting, spanking, etc.), the amount of violence in the interactive should never be too extreme. The exception to this is if an author specifically makes an option at the end of a chapter to be explicitly violent. In this case, it's the reader's decision to go down that path.

Be creative and have fun!
